instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: A1466 - 820-00165-A very slow
threads.message:
Hi, 

I have an A1466 - 820-00165-A that only powers on, if the power on button is pressed for about 10 seconds, and when it boots it is very slow in OS.

Don't know what can be causing this. 

Can you help?

threads.title: A1466 - 820-00165-A very slow
threads.message:
It was a bad cap.

TKS!

threads.title: A1466 - 820-00165-A very slow
threads.message:
It was a bad cap.

TKS!

threads.title: A1466 - 820-00165-A very slow
threads.message:
Hi, again.

It seams that I have another problem with this one: It doesn't recognize any battery. Already tried a know good battery and with same problem. It isen't recognized in the OS, neither by the board (doesn't charge).

Can you help?

threads.title: A1466 - 820-00165-A very slow
threads.message:
Check voltage and diode mode to ground on SCL/SDA lines of battery bus.
What is the exact PPBUS_G3H voltage?

Did you try known good LIO board?

threads.title: A1466 - 820-00165-A very slow
threads.message:
It was a bad contact on the battery conector.

TKS
